entry.title: About
entry.summary: My name is Vlad, I am a master’s student at the University of Bucharest, I work there at the Centre for Computational Linguistics, and I am a contributor to the Python machine learning library scikit-learn.
entry.content: My name is Vlad, I am a master’s student at the University of Bucharest, I work there at the Centre for Computational Linguistics, and I am a contributor to the Python machine learning library scikit-learn.
